name: Outsourcing Attendance
query:
SELECT  oa.owner as `Created by`,
        oa.modified_by as `Approved by`,
        upper(oa.shift_name) as `Shift`,
        oa.shift_date as `Date:Date:`,
        oad.person_name as `Person Name`,
        oad.position as `Position`, 
        if(oad.status = 'Present', 1, 0) as `Present:Int:`,
        if(oad.status = 'Absent ', 1, 0) as `Absent:Int:`,
        if(oad.status = 'Day off', 1, 0) as `Day off:Int:`,
        1 as `Total:Int:`,
        oad.remarks as `Remarks`
FROM    `tabOutsourcing Attendance` as  oa,
        `tabOutsourcing Attendance Details` oad
WHERE   oa.name = oad.parent

name: Security Attendance Report
query:
SELECT  sa.owner as `Created by`,
        sa.modified_by as `Approved by`,
        upper(sa.shift_name) as `Shift`,
        sa.shift_date as `Date:Date:`,
        sad.guard_name as `Guard Name`,
        sad.position as `Position`, 
        if(sad.status = 'Present', 1, 0) as `Present:Int:`,
        if(sad.status = 'Absent ', 1, 0) as `Absent:Int:`,
        if(sad.status = 'Day off', 1, 0) as `Day off:Int:`,
        1 as `Total:Int:`,
        sad.remarks as `Remarks`
FROM    `tabSecurity Attendance` as  sa,
        `tabSecurity Attendance Details` sad
WHERE   sa.name = sad.parent
